name: Blickel Neon Night
description:
Run and Gun your way through several levels and fight your way to the big bad at the end.

NOTE: If the game doesn't take inputs on the browser version, refresh the page. The Windows version also has extra features, so download that for the best gameplay experience. This game was made for the 2021 Amaze Me Game Jam hosted by YoYo Games and Opera.

Warning: This game was designed to have an 80's synthwave aesthetic, and the background can be hard on the eyes.

Controls:

(A & D / D-PAD) : Move 

(L / Bottom Button) :  Jump

(K / Left Button) : Shoot

(S / Down): Duck (Ducking protects against projectiles)

Multiplayer;

Plug in a second controller on the main menu to play with a friend. (Needs 2 controllers to work)
